name: Designator, Snub (SnD-8)
description: The snub designator is a small, easy to carry designator used to mark a target for attack. Due to its smaller size, the snub designator has a reduced range.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
